name: ShippingLogistical
description: Boat Depots launch Boats onto bodies of water to move a massive amount of Products to other Boat Depots.

name: BreweryFactory
description: The Brewery and Distillery use various Farm based Products to make alcoholic Products like Beer, and Vodka well as Biofuel.

name: FurnitureFactory
description: The Carpentry takes Wood to create various Constructions goods like Wooden Planks, Furniture Bases, and Office Furniture.

name: CoalGatherer
description: The Coal Mine uses Harvesters to collect units of Coal from Coal deposits placed on Land tiles across the map.

name: CopperGatherer
description: The Copper Mine uses Harvesters to collect units of Copper from Copper deposits placed on Land tiles across the map.

name: CropFarm
description: The Crop Farm allows you to use fields to generate Wheat, Hops, Potatoes, and Vegetables.

name: DrinksFactory
description: The Drinks Factory uses various Farm based Products to make Food Products like Berry Smoothie, Apple Smoothie, or Orange Soda.

name: FishingGatherer
description: The Fisherman Pier uses Harvesters to collect units of Fish from schools of fish located in various bodies of water across the map.

name: FoodFactory
description: The Food Factory uses various Farm based Products to make other Food Products like Flour, Beef Stew, and Fried Chicken.

name: GasGatherer
description: The Gas Pump uses Harvesters to collect units of Gas from Gas deposits placed on Land tiles across the map.

name: GlassworksSmelter
description: The Glassworks & Smelter uses Iron, Sand, and Copper to make Heavy Industrial Products like Steel, Glass, and Copper Wiring.

name: ElectronicsFactory
description: The Home Goods Factory uses Heavy Industrial Products to make goods people use in the house holds like Stovetops, and Telephones.

name: IronGatherer
description: The Iron Mine uses Harvesters to collect units of Iron from Iron deposits placed on Land tiles across the map.

name: LivestockFarm
description: The Livestock Farm allows you to use fields to generate Chickens, Cows, and Sheep.

name: LumberyardGatherer
description: The Lumberyard uses Harvesters to collect units of Wood from nearby Trees. After harvesting a Tree, it will plant a Sapling in its place.

name: OilSeaGatherer
description: The Offshore Oil Drill uses Harvesters to collect units of Oil from Oil deposits in bodies of Water across the map.

name: OilGatherer
description: The Oil Drill uses Harvesters to collect units of Oil from Oil deposits placed on Land tiles across the map.

name: OrchardFarm
description: The Orchard Farm allows you to use fields to generate Apples, Grapes, and Oranges.

name: PaperFactory
description: The Papermill uses Wood to make Light Industrial Products like Heavy Pulp, Paper Roll, and Books.

name: PetrochemicalFactory
description: The Petrochemical Plant uses Oil and Gas to make Heavy Industrial Products like Plastics, Tires, and Computer Interfaces.

name: PlantationFarm
description: The Plantation Farm allows you to use fields to generate Berries, Cotton, Sugar and Cocoa.

name: PreservationFactory
description: The Preservation Factory uses various Food based Products to make Food Products like Soup, Canned Mutton, and Chicken Soup.

name: SandGatherer
description: The Sand Collector uses Harvesters to collect units of Sand from coastal tile along any of body water on the map.

name: TextileFactory
description: The Textile Factory uses various Farm based Products like Cotton and Berries to make Clothing Products like Light Fabric, and Work Clothes.

name: TrainLogistical
description: Train Terminals that are connected by Train Tracks use Trains to move a large number of Products from Warehouses across the map.

name: WarehouseLogistical
description: Warehouses work as central Hubs to distribute Products among buildings within its radius or between other Warehouses using Logistic Requests.

name: WaterGatherer
description: The Water Siphon uses Harvesters to collect units of Water from any body of Water on the map.

name: ZeppelinLogistical
description: Zeppelin Stations use Zeppelins to move Products across the map. No need for any network connections, Zeppelins float over everything.

name: Headquarters
description: The Headquarters act as your central control hub for your business, managing your Tech Tree, Loans, and Contracts.

name: Automotive Factory
description: The Automotive Factory uses Products from other industries to make Components to make the Car Prototype in the Car Assembly Factory.

name: AssemblyFactory
description: The Car Assembly Factory uses various Products made in the Automotive Factory to make the Car Prototype.

name: ComputerFactory
description: The Computer Factory uses Products made in various other Factories to make the First Computer Prototype.

name: DinnerFactory
description: The Dinner Factory uses Products made in various other Factories to make the Chicken Dinner Prototype.

name: WaterTower
description: The Irrigation Tower will collect and distribute units of Water to buildings that need it without the need for Roads or Trucks.

name: WaterWell
description: The Water Well uses Harvesters to collect units of Water from underground.

name: AirPurifier
description: The Air Purifier uses Water, collected from a Water Siphon or Water Well, to clean the surrounding area of Pollution.

name: ChemicalScrubber
description: The Chemical Scrubber uses Chemicals, generated at the Petrochemical Plant, to clean the surrounding area of Pollution.

name: WaterTreatmentPlant
description: The Water Treatment Plant uses Sand, collected from a Sand Collector, to clean Water Tiles of Pollution.

name: ToyFactory
description: The Toy Factory uses various Products like Cotton and Wood to make Toy Products like Fluff, Toy Train Sets, and Marbles.
